feed.title: ByPhone
feed.subtitle: No contracts. No hassles. Simply build your own dedicated, hosted phone system in minutes.

entry.title: Small Office
entry.content:
The solution

We were all given an extension number and a personal voicemail box connected to our email addresses.

The main number didn’t have to change and was connected to the new hosted PBX via an auto attendant that re-directs incoming calls and, if unanswered, voicemail is emailed to the team member called.

When customers call they hear a friendly greeting and can choose between a specific department (copywriting, graphics, accounts), an employee’s extension or leave a voicemail.

Everyone can see who’s calling and can transfer callers to colleagues and even host conference calls. Whenever a customer calls the graphics department both mobiles ring simultaneously (ring-all) and whoever is available first can answer the call.

“We got the teams’ communications unified as had been the original objective and with the added benefit of significant telecoms cost savings..”
entry.summary: Many small office/home office (SoHo) based businesses don’t have or use a landline and instead prefer to use mobile phones. This works for making calls (outbound calls) but then which of these mobile numbers is then the main business number to be handed out for taking calls (inbound calls).

entry.title: National mobility
entry.summary: With Byphone you are not tied geographically. You have full control over how your phone system behaves, and it doesn't have to just mirror the hierarchy of your business.

entry.title: International mobility
entry.content:
What they said

We depend on seamless World-wide communications 24x7 across our entire organisational structure to keep our tourists stress-free.

You want to order or seek help online? That’s alright. You want the reassurance of talking at any time? That’s OK too.

Worried about the cost of a mobile call from “Oz” to the UK? Just dial our Sydney number for free. Our twenty five reps on-the-ground are all over in the World at any time so there’s always someone at work to speak to.

Byphone seeks that someone out. With local numbers in ten cities across three continents we present as a multinational agency from one high street HQ.
entry.summary: International numbers give you a real global presence no matter where you are. And by offering numbers in thousands of cities worldwide, we make it more affordable for your customers to reach you wherever they are.

entry.title: Branch offices
entry.summary: Many businesses expand by adding offices or stores in different locations. Successful geographic growth involves logistical complexity and management finesse to retain team cohesion. A flexible system for taking calls (inbound calls) and making calls (outbound calls) is essential.
